traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the {@condition charmed} condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: The elf wears a suit of {@item elven chain}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The elf makes two Scimitar attacks and uses Radiant Beam (if available).

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Beam (3/Day)
entries: A magical beam of radiance flashes out from Xeleth's hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line. Each creature in the line must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8 damage) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The elf casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:
